title: President Rajapaksa Leaves for Bahrain
content: President Mahinda Rajapaksa left for Bahrain this morning on a two-day state visit. This is the President’s first visit to the country. During the tour, the President will hold bilateral discussions with His Majesty King Hamad bin Isa Al-Khalifa, the King of Bahrain, and the two countries are also scheduled to sign several memorandums of…
